about_the_game:
Evolution Seller is a simulator of a monster breeder and seller.
Potion craft with pokemonsters and a combat system in the style of Loop Hero.

The player takes control of a shop that sells monsters.
Around the store there are plots of land in different biomes that can be purchased. In these areas there are lairs of monsters for evolution, and there are also monsters in them that you can fight.

Every day a player receives a limited number of monsters from his possessions. These monsters need to be sent into battle to evolve, because basic monsters are worth nothing.

Improve the store, explore the map. Create the rarest and most expensive monsters.

The game is planned for release
- Global map with more than 12 different biomes.
- More than 30 basic monsters to evolve.
- More than 400 types of evolved monsters.
- A store and more than 10 extensions to it.
- More than 20 hours of gameplay to complete the main story and an endless search for new combinations for evolution.

name: Evolution seller

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or analog
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 550 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or analog
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 550 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Evolution Seller is a simulator of a monster breeder and seller. Potion craft with pokemonsters and a combat system in the style of Loop Hero. Create unique combinations of monsters, leading them through battles in the arena, because only in battle can you become stronger and evolve.
